structure.unit: ARTICLE XLI. ROCKMINING OVERLAY ZONING AREA (ROZA)

law.catch_line: Minimum Landscaped Open Space, Mitigation Areas and Littoral Zones.

text.section:
Sec. 33-424. Minimum Landscaped Open Space, Mitigation Areas and Littoral Zones.
Notwithstanding any provisions of or (Landscaping Code) of the Code and due to the nature of the uses authorized by this Article and the requirements for these uses set forth in and by other state, regional, and federal agencies, the mitigation areas and littoral zones provided for under all of the foregoing shall be deemed to constitute compliance with the landscaped open space requirements for the uses authorized by this Article. The timing of the installation of any required mitigation and littoral areas shall be governed by the permits issued by DERM pursuant to of this Code.
